Text:
For those of you wondering... it's a shaky cam filmed from the left side of a theater.  Thanks for your efforts, anyway.
Audio: 6/10 - good for cam
Video: 3/10
So why is this movie taking so long to hit the scene?  The actual DVD/Bluray release will be here in 5 weeks and no sign of anything other than a couple bad cam copies.

@madbytes1 most probably because it is such a huge blockbuster that it is harder to obtain than ones that were not as popular etc.  thats my thoughts haha.  very keen to get my hands on it when it comes out (on pirate bay) :)
The hunger games comes out on DVD in Russia 1 week earlier. If we're lucky, someone might upload it.
in Australia the dvd is out since 1 july .i dont know why not any fucker has got hand on it :(
i could have gotten a good copy at a hotel i was at but i didn't have my recording device with me :( from now on im bringing it with whenever i go to a hotel
